title: Looking for Top Laner Plat+
body:
Recently had our top laner leave due to not being active enough to regularly Ranked 5 (2+ times/week).

Just add me if you interested in a trail. End of last season we were climbing insanely quick and getting paired with ranked 5 high plat low diamond teams (master players).

IGN: Kez

replies.body: Diam player here, can adapt to the team comp, used to main kass top last season, now more into heca, liss, mao, fiora. add me if you wanna have a game :)

Well im no plat, and no one has replyed. Since your having trials, if your willing to trial a bronze, i will give it a shot. Just because im bronze does not mean im new or dont know how to play. I will try to prove it in trials if accepted. Top lane vlad is my main, hardly lose ever. Dunno, thought i would just chuck ya a message and see what happens. Your call though.
